text: Hu'neanagi Monafi sondia vahe'mofo Ra Anumzamo'a amanage hu'ne, Jerusalemi kumamofo megi'ama megagi'nea zafaramina antagitreta ana zafareti tukera aheta kuma keginamofo tavaonte ante hihi hinkeno marerina, anante manineta hara huzmantegahaze. Na'ankure Jerusalemi kumapina vahe'ma azeri haviza hu'zamo avite'ne.
